data.eml:eml: The NSW Bird Atlassers (NSWBA) was established in 1982 as an independent, volunteer-based, non-profit group with the joint aims of monitoring the distribution of birds in New South Wales and the Australian Capital Territory, preserving habitats, providing a proper basis for environmental impact studies and for other ornithological reference purposes.This data resource contains records from the FieldData sighting collector. For the full atlas, see http://collections.ala.org.au/public/show/dr1089
